alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 8:01AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF VERY HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of very heavy lake effect snow continues to move slowly north across Jefferson county, extending into far eastern Lewis county. This lake effect snow band will produce very heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour and visibility locally reduced to less than one-half mile as it continues to lift north into the Watertown and Fort Drum areas between 8 and 9 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Carthage, Lowville, West Carthage, Adams, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Barnes Corners, Southwick Beach State Park, Denmark, New Bremen, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville, and Rodman. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 39 and 47. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. && TIME...MOT...LOC 1258Z 210DEG 212KT 4361 7692
